item.title: Vimanas in Ancient India â€“ Were They Real Flying Machines?
item.description: The idea of Vimanas, ancient flying machines mentioned in Indian scriptures, has fascinated historians, scientists, and enthusiasts alike. Some believe these texts describe advanced aerial technology far ahead of their time, while others argue that Vimanas are purely mythological. But could ancient India have actually possessed flying technology, or are these references symbolic? Let’s explo
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
